restaurants.name: Maxime's Restaurant and Lounge
restaurants.location: 1131 St Mary's Rd | Manitoba, Winnipeg, Manitoba R2M 3T9, Canada

menu.name: Smoked Turkey Wrap
menu.ingredients: Smoked in house turkey breast, walnut butter, avocado, cucumber, tomatoes, hummus, provolone, zucchini, red onions and carrots in a whole wheat tortilla wrap. Accompanied by a citrus garlic parmesan kale salad or sweet potato fries. Served with the soup du jour to start.

menu.name: Harissa Stuffed Bone-in Chicken
menu.ingredients: An 8 oz.chicken breast, bone in, stuffed with mejool dates, charred cauliflower, fresh dill, mint, pistachios & feta cheese and presented with a harissa red chili pepper cream sauce. Accompanied by middle eastern roasted lemon, garlic and cilantro fingerling potatoes and roasted butternut squash, zucchini, carrots and red onions. Served with the soup du jour or the house field green salad to start.

menu.name: Steak Salad
menu.ingredients: Grilled steak served over a bed of romaine lettuce, grilled vegetables and criolla dressed with balsamic reduction and olive oil.

menu.name: Gringo Burguer
menu.ingredients: Cheddar, aioli, and all the usual suspects, served with house chips.
